name: The Roc 大鹏
description:
Hello, everyone, we are the production team of Zhefuso, this is the first game we made.

——Story Overview——

I followed my parents to a big city near the sea after the job changes in high school and my parents. My parents are passionate about the promotion of work, the optimization of the environment, and the rise of class. I am the only one who seems unhappy.

Before I was seventeen, my life was full of the color of that small, sluggish, dying industrial city. Withered and dark. But the new city is full of vigor, and the beautiful blueprint of cyan and gold is out of tune with me. I am like a wandering soul, lost in this huge city maze.

I don't belong here, I shouldn't be here.
Until the encounter with "her".

Her favorite character is Gui Li, her favorite novel is "The immortal gourd", her favorite magic weapon is the Seven Sins Yao Qin, and her favorite Cultivation Method is 《Stellar Transformations》.

Like me, her favorite is loneliness.

——Character Introduction——

"Me": Wu Shengyou

Searching for secluded place, finding a pond. My parents want me to be a person who travels thousands of miles, but I only want to read thousands of books.
"I lost an arm and opened an eye." I followed my parents to the new city, but when did the new eyes open?

Zhou Qing



Sleep in get out of class and disappear after class. The group leader receiving the homework will skip her, and the teacher will ignore her in the lecture.
She is like a ghost, wandering on a line parallel to her classmates.
Only I am her friend, only I understand her, only me...


Wei Hongshan



The monitor of the new class, she is the kind of person I admire most, and the kind of person I am least likely to be.
She is like a sun, shiningly alive. Unlike me, I can only reflect the light of others.

——STAFF——


Script: 朱仙变

Procedure: 炛

Music: MF endo, 朱仙变

Art: Rebix

If you are interested in the game, please add the game to the wish list, or click "Fantastic Idea" https://zhongchou.modian.com/item/99983.htmlon the creative interface of Modian. This is a great support and encouragement for us.

Welcome to join the QQ group chat to discuss the game with us: 1137748161
